detail_desc: Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Side pockets, a narrow detachable belt and rounded hem. Unlined.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Side pockets, a narrow detachable belt and rounded hem. Unlined.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Side pockets, a narrow detachable belt and rounded hem. Unlined.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Side pockets, a narrow detachable belt and rounded hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with concealed press-studs at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt in three layers. Recycled polyester lining.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy. Adjustable straps with a metal fastener, elastication at the sides of the waist and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Partly lined.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist with glittery elastication and a flower at one side, and a double-layered tulle skirt. Lined.

A-line blouse in a viscose weave. Double layer at the top with a lace yoke and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs.

A-line blouse in a viscose weave. Double layer at the top with a lace yoke and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs.

A-line dress in airy, patterned viscose twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist for added width. Unlined.

A-line dress in airy, patterned viscose twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist for added width. Unlined.

A-line dress in airy, patterned viscose twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist for added width. Unlined.
Flared skirt in soft cotton corduroy with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Flared skirt in soft cotton corduroy with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle. Shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle. Shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle. Shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.
Voluminous skirt in glittery tulle with elastication and a decorative bow with tassels at the waist. Cotton poplin lining.

Set with a dress in viscose twill and gilet in soft faux shearling. Dress with a round neck, small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounced trim over the shoulders and along the front of the yoke. Long sleeves with concealed elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined. Gilet with a concealed button at the front. Lined.

Fitted, calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave. Frill-trimmed sweetheart neckline with a drawstring at the front and short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back, a concealed zip in one side and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband at the top and wide, taped reinforcements down the legs for extra support. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Calf-length skirt in patterned mesh. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam at the hem with a bead-embroidered flounce. Jersey lining.

Shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Sun visor in braided straw with covered elastication at the back and a fabric sweatband.
Sun visor in braided straw with covered elastication at the back and a fabric sweatband.
Sun visor in braided straw with covered elastication at the back and a fabric sweatband.
5-pocket, high-waisted, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), a zip fly and narrow hems.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a high waist and button fly.
Bucket hat in organic cotton twill. Width of brim 7.5 cm. Lined.
Treggings in soft, patterned corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Wide, ankle-length jeans in washed, lightweight cotton denim with an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams.

Sturdy hat in braided paper straw with a flat crown. Band in an airy weave around half the hat that continues down through the sides to form ties that can be fastened in various ways. Width of brim 7.5 cm.

Sturdy hat in braided paper straw with a flat crown. Band in an airy weave around half the hat that continues down through the sides to form ties that can be fastened in various ways. Width of brim 7.5 cm.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Treggings in stretch twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.

Fully lined, batik-patterned swimsuit with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed elastication under the bust and a deep V-neck and long ties at the back. High-cut legs with flounced trims at the sides, and medium coverage at the back. The polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and sewn-on bow with tassels. Side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Calf-length lace kaftan with a crocheted trim around the opening, a drawstring and twisted ties at the waist, and long sleeves. Scalloped trim around the cuffs and hem.

Cropped, sleeveless top in a patterned viscose weave with a deep V-neck front and back, and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, narrow ties at the back to keep the top in place, and wide ties at the hem.
Short skirt in grained imitation leather with a high waist and visible zip at the back. Lined.
Short skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and wrapover front with ties at one side and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Pull-on trousers in soft cotton twill with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and a frill trim at the top. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. One patterned pair.
Cap in patterned cotton twill with a lightly padded sweatband and an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads. Twisted cord band with a bow. Unlined. Width of brim 12 cm.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Seam and a double layer of fabric under the bust, gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and medium coverage at the back. The polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Seam and a double layer of fabric under the bust, gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and medium coverage at the back. The polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.

Trousers in softly draping viscose twill with wide elastication and a tie belt at the waist, a frill trim at the top and a fake fly. Side pockets and flap leg pockets with a button. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Gently fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with peak lapels, a French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and a detachable, soft tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and a detachable, soft tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and a detachable, soft tie belt. Fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets.
Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft, gently draping jersey with elastication and a flounced trim at the top and two high slits at the front. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft, gently draping jersey with elastication and a flounced trim at the top and two high slits at the front. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft, gently draping jersey with elastication and a flounced trim at the top and two high slits at the front. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with decorative pompom trims. Braided detail around the neckline and an opening at the top with tasselled, twisted ties. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with decorative pompom trims. Braided detail around the neckline and an opening at the top with tasselled, twisted ties. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with a pocket at the top, adjustable straps with metal fasteners at the front, and buttons at the sides.
